release_notes.en-US:
### Added
- More locale translations for preferences

### Fixed
- Messages marked as local due to missing countryCode but had coords
- Missing preferences styles

- Added Display option for hiding the MailHops bar for CompactHeaders add-on
- Started adding locale translations for preferences

Added
- Display styles in settings to customize MailHops bar background color, font color and font size
- Polish language locale

Fixed
- Received header id parsed as an IP address
- MailHops bar showing up on load with no message selected
Redesigned the MailHops bar

- MailHops API v2 membership
- Filters section in preferences
- Tag and mark as junk by CountryCode
- Time Traveled, total time it took for the email to reach you

Fixed potential css issue
Changed event handler to addEventListener

Updated Styles
Added SSL as default for API calls
Tested with TB 47
Added check that IP address starts with digit less than 240 (IANA-RESERVED)
Bug fix for parsing cached location, added try catch around missed JSON.parse
Fixed distance display, now calculates distance from last hop on the client

Added Map provider in preferences
Fixed Save language in preferences
Fixed Display if only city in response

Removed loading indicator when no received headers found
Secure message parsing

Fixed load pref
Added multiple IP check in Received header

Added dropdown for map, refresh and options
Added refresh cache function
Added more data on current location in the options

Added lookup cache
Added resizable map

Includes Hosting option
New preferences panel

Added display of DKIM and SPF results from message header
Added display of DNSBL results from MailHops API
Fixed display of duplicate IP addresses
Fixed order of X-Originating-IP in route list.  Thanks again RIch for finding this one.  Also updated the country flag icons styles to actual size.
Fix to testIP call, there was a problem if an IP address was in the Received header twice.

Added Context menu for Hops
Updated JSON call to use parse
Fixed the order of IPs being added to the route array
